layer.name: Resources
layer.definition: The logical produce of skill; surplus in the forms of money, time, energy, knowledge, and relational capital that can be stewarded and reinvested for ongoing value. Not just having enough — having MORE than enough.

questions.text: My health is robust enough to absorb a setback (illness, injury, stress) without cascade failure.
I recover from illness or injury faster than average — my body has resources to heal.
My overall wellness creates capacity for life rather than limiting it.
questions.principle: Health is enabling, not just absence of disease

questions.text: I have invested in preventive care and maintenance that is paying dividends in current health.
My integrated health (body, soul, spirit) creates synergy — each area supports the others rather than dragging them down.
